product_name: Icebreaker Technical 150 Relay Half-Zip Long Underwear Top - Men's
long_description: The Icebreaker Relay Half-Zip long underwear top uses ultralight merino wool and a ventilating zipper to prevent overheating to keep you comfortable during fast-paced activities in cool weather. Made of soft, nonirritating merino wool with a touch of spandex for stretch, Icebreaker Relay Half-Zip long underwear top resists odors naturally. Ultralight merino wool wicks away moisture, dries quickly and breathes well to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in cool weather. Fabric offers protection from UV light with a rating of UPF 50+. Raglan sleeve construction allows unhindered shoulder movement; thumbholes in the sleeves help keep hands and wrists warm. Flat seams reduce chafing. Machine washable; lay flat to dry.
short_description: The Icebreaker Relay Half-Zip long underwear top uses ultralight merino wool and a ventilating zipper to prevent overheating to keep you comfortable during fast-paced activities in cool weather.
